alert.note: Alert for Albany; Laramie; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 4:16PM MDT until July 28 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Albany County in southeastern Wyoming... Northwestern Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... Southwestern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 416 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Wheatland Reservoir 3, or 33 miles north of Laramie, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Iron Mountain and Baldy Peak. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
